text: Chengdu University (), is a public university located in Chengdu, the capital of Sichuan Province, China. Chengdu University was founded in 1978. The university has 18 colleges with over 1,600 teachers and professors and more than 30,000 students.http://www.baike.com/wiki/%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6 ==References== * Introduction of The University Category:Universities and colleges in Chengdu Category:1978 establishments in China
title: Chengdu University
